message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share
I'll take a slight majority, but still a decent share for you
I'll give you a decent share, but I want the majority
I'll compromise, but I want a slightly better share
I'll give you a slightly better share, but I want a bit more
I'll take a bit more, but still a decent share for you
Let's meet in the middle, a 50/50 split
